text: A Walnut Tree is a Pakistani documentary film by Ammar Aziz. The film is about an internally displaced old man reminiscing about a distant homeland. The film had its world premiere at International Documentary Film Festival Amsterdam in November 2015. In the same month, the film won the award for best film from Film Southasia, Nepal. It was also officially selected for Bangalore International Film Festival, 2016. == References == Category:2015 films Category:Pakistani documentary films Category:Documentary films about refugees Category:2015 documentary films Category:Refugees in Pakistan Category:Pakistani films
title: A Walnut Tree
